General.Name: Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited
General.Description: Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the health spa and wellness-related businesses. The company operates RarinJinda Wellness Spa, a wellness spa; Let's Relax, a day spa service; Baan Suan Massage center; Stretch me by Let's Relax, a stretching studio; Stretch me Clinic; RarinJinda Wellness Spa Resort, a boutique hotel resort; and a restaurant under the Deck One name and a cafe under the name ORB & Bar, as well as offers Dr. Spiller Pure Skin Care Solutions for facial indulgence. It also operates a Thai massage school under the Siam Wellness Thai Massage and Spa School name. In addition, the company manufactures and distributes spa products, such as massage oils, essential oils, body lotions, liquid and bar soaps, shower gels, and herbal tea selections. Further, it provides management and consultancy services. The company distributes its products to hair salons, beauty clinics, hospitals, and spas. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
